name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amplifeed: Amplify Your Brand on LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your LinkedIn presence with Amplifeed. Share an idea or a thought, we draft a LinkedIn post for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amplify your personal brand on LinkedIn with an AI Assistant

Designed for professionals eager to make an impactful presence on LinkedIn and share it with their team, Amplifeed is your ultimate LinkedIn companion. Amplifeed is more than just a content creator; it's a bridge between your LinkedIn presence and your Slack team. 

Features & Benefits:

‚úçÔ∏è Intuitive Content Creation
Share a topic, idea, or thought, and Amplifeed will craft an engaging post draft for you. Say goodbye to writer's block and welcome compelling content with ease.

üë• Seamless LinkedIn Integration
Operate directly within your LinkedIn share box, ensuring you can express and impress without juggling multiple tools.

üîÑ Sync with Slack 
Broadcast your successful LinkedIn posts back to a Slack channel of your choice, fostering community awareness and engagement. This feature is entirely optional, ensuring you remain in control.

üöÄ Boost Your Personal Brand  
With consistently well-drafted posts, elevate your online image, establish authority in your domain, and captivate your audience more effectively.


How to Use Amplifeed:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Click on the LinkedIn share box.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Share your topic, idea, or thought with Amplifeed.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Within moments, receive a crafted post draft.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Personalize it and share.
5Ô∏è‚É£ If you've linked and chosen a Slack channel, watch as your post gets broadcasted to your Slack community, keeping everyone in the loop.
